1.content: It takes you a moment to even realize you're conscious. It's hard to tell when everything is pitch black. You try to scratch your face, but something is holding your wrists up in the air. A rope or something. You feel out a complex metal wrist restraint and begin to fiddle with it as best you can.
1.title: Deija Vu

choices: You are a Furry or Scaly
You're some sort of cartoon character
11.content: You pull your arms down with a sigh of relief. You immediately pick yourself up and start searching for a light. You find one almost immediately and get a good look at yourself.
11.title: You manage to escape

111.content: Are you furry or scaly?
111.title: Furry or Scaly?

1111.content:
You find you have been turned into a a red squirrel. You have red-gold fur are about five-foot three and have size 5 feet with five toes like a human foot.

You decide to exit do you...
1111.title: Squirrely

11111.content: You find yourself in a dark hallway, it is terribly cold and you shiver. You come across a two doors one say Looney Tunes and the other Loonatics which one do you choose?
11111.title: Two Doors

111112.content:
At first you think you see the origanal Looney Tunes Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck and the rest

But no these creatures are differnt. They are the Looney Tune's futuristic decendents!

Lexi Bunny approaches you. "Tell us stranger, are you ticklish?"
111112.title: Loonatics

choices: Ace Bunny tickles your feet with a feather
Danger Duck  tickles your pits with his hands
1111121.content:
"No I'm not." You say Danger Duck creeps up behind you.

"Than you won't mind if I do this!"

He wraps his hands around your neck and his feathery fingers tickle your Adam's apple!

(Which is amazing as you didn't think squirrels had Adam's apples)

"Looks like someone is a little liar and needs to be punished." Danger said with a sneer

They tie you down to a table and Rev fetches feathers, brushes and ice and they start to work.
1111121.title: Bad move

1111122.content:
"Yes I am, and it's unbearable! Please don't tickle me!"


You start to cry and the Loonatics look sort of embaressed

"Ah don't blubber Doc," Ace Bunny says handing you a hankie "I can't stand to see a grown Squirrel cry." You take the hankie and wipe away your tears.

"Tell you what." Tech E Coyote starts "We won't tickle you just yet instead we'll let you tickle us."

"I never agreed to that!" Danger Duck outbursts " Everyone sushes him."

"Well?" Inquires Lexi
1111122.title: Tell 'em the Truth

11111221.content:
"How can I refuse? Yes!" You are feeling much better now

"Ok then Doc." Ace says "Choose two of us to tickle."


"I choose Tech and Rev."

The Coyote and Roadrunner chuckle and take of their uniforms reaveling their underwear. Tech is wearing black bokers and Rev wears red breifs. They both lie down on two tables and Ace and Danger strap them in.


Who do you choose first?
11111221.title: Speed and Brains

choices: dig in and make him beg
111112211.content:
You make a beeline for Tech's feet. They are these oversized, wolfish, three-toed things with jet black fur on top and pale green soles. You scritch along with your deft little claws, making him shutter with each touch. You lightly tease his heels with both hands, letting him twitch and squirm.

"Hehe, thats enough." You continue crawling all over his soles, making him recoil futilely.
111112211.title: Tech E Coyote

1111122111.content:
You notice as he wiggles his toes, they move so fast thay become a blur.

You stick your finger between left and middle toe and Tech yips. Your sweet little tounge licks the right toe and he howls with luaghter

"The worse you tickle me, the worse I'm going to tickle you back!" Tech warns though his giggles

Considering this you decide
1111122111.title: Coyote Toes

11111221111.content: You think you've tickled his feet enough so you go for his...
11111221111.title: Tickle elswhere on Tech's body

choices: Stay with the Loonatics for a while
111112211112.content:
You start by looking around for a stiff brush. Without even asking for one, Ace hands you one with a wicked smile. You turn back to Tech and brush it once along his furry belly. He recoils and pants, looking completely spooked.

"No, no, no. I can't do this one" he pleads. You shrug and, much to his horror, bring the brush down again. A couple of quick, hard scrubs has him thrashing about and making all sorts of funny sounds. You continue for a while, making sure the brush gets all over, before dropping it and continuing with your claws. Dancing and clawing all around his belly button makes him squirm horribly, making funny noises and faces all the while. Digging in all your claws at once produces a sound like "Yai yai yai yai yai!" and everyone starts laughing.

Ace can't stand just watching anymore, so he starts fiddling with Tech's fluffy feet. Lexi joins in to start kneading his hips, and so on. Pretty soon, you can't get anywhere near him.

"Hey, let me out of here!' cries Rev. "I want to try his belly out, too!" Instead, you decide to lay into Rev's belly. After a bit of torture and high-pitched laughing, you pop open his restraints.

"Do you know if the Looney Toons are around here somewhere?"

"Of course, they're right upstairs. If you go out that door, down the hallway, up the elevator, and come back this way, you can't miss them."
111112211112.title: Belly

choices: They all decide to join you for some fun!
Tech and Rev decide to demonstrate how comfortable those restraint-tables are.
1111122111121.content:
"Haha! If you guys are this fun to tickle, I can't wait to see how your predecessors react!" You chuckle, starting for an open door nearby, with a set of stairs leading up revealed behind it.

         Tech half-smiles at that, changing back into his suit. "Yah? Don't look forward too much. They sure aren't as merciful as we are. Speaking of which, you owe me and Rev one. I sincerely doubt that we can tickle you worse then what we just went through, no matter how sensetive you claim to be!"

"Well, if your wondering what it's like dishing it out, it's every bit as fun as it looks, and then some!" Lexi giggles.

         Seeing Tech idly toying with the brush you used so affectively on his belly makes you nervous, but gives you an idea. You turn to adress the entire group of Lunatics."Come to think of it, do all you guys wanna help me go after the 'Toones? There should be enough up there to keep us all occupied for a while. I might not stand much of a chance on my own if I just waltz in there and go at it, but togethor..."
1111122111121.title: A Sensetive Situation...

1111122112.content:
"Let me decide when you had enough!" You say and dig into his pads, causing him to release a wolfish whine. You focus on his left paw, grabbing it by the toes and tickle his tense arches. "Nooohoho! Stahahap!" He pleads, but you continue the assault. You dig you claws into his heel and with agonising slowness, drag them up to the base of his toes. "Ahahahaha! Plehehehease! STAHAHAHAP!" He cries in despair and tugs on his restraints with all his might, but its not very effective.
Meanwhile the ither toons begin to tickle Rev who immediately joins Tech in the uncontrollable laughter. Ace is using one of Revs own feathers to torment his feet with, switching between his arches and toes with impressive skill. Rev can only scream and curl his toes, but its no use.
Despite his begging you switch to Techs right foot and repeat the previous process. Soon after his laughter turns into crying, his tears rolling into the fur on his cheaks and all he can yell is "Stahahahahahap! Nohohot my fehehet! Plehehease!"...
1111122112.title: dig in and make him beg

111112212.content:
You approch Rev, The Roadrunner looks both giddy and nervous that you're starting on him.


You begin by pounceing on his blue feathered belly and scribbling your long claws all other it!

Rev bursts into giggles and sucks up his gut trying to avoid your claws, he is quite an skinny fellow, so lean that when he sucks up his gut you can see his ribcage.

"Hmmm I wonder how many ribs Roadrunners have."

You begin to count his ribs giving each one a poke "1, 2, 3, 4...oh darn I've lost count."

You start again from the top and Rev is going nut Meep-meeping with luaghter.

Soon the rip tickling gets old, what should you do now?
111112212.title: Rev Runner

1111122122.content:
You take a good look and Rev's feet they brownish-orange in color and are long and narrow with three long toes on each.


First you doodle your index finger on his shallow left arch just to get a feel for it. It is scaly just as bird's foot should be. You begin by putting your finger on the ball of his foot and sliding downward. You do this a few times in sucesstion. Rev wiggles his toes and giggles enjoying every minute of this, you then decide to suprise his by attacking his...
1111122122.title: Ticklish Feet

11111221222.content:
You pinch lightly at Rev's heel, for a moment he gasps, gulping air too fast. Apparently you've found his sweet spot!

You continue pincing at Rev's feet you move to the balls and over the sole but always retern back to heel to make the bird's voice catch in his throat!

"Tee hee hee hee" Rev twitters "Plheeheeease!" Nhohooo" MORE!" Then finaly he shouts at the top of his lungs "HEY RIP I NEED HELP OVER HERE?"

You puase wondering who on Earth Rip is, but then like a creeping shadow something seizes you by the Armpits!

"Hey there." Says a voice unusauly slow for a roadrunner "I'm Rev's little brother call me Rip."

He then starts tickling your armpits which happan to be YOUR sweetspot! There is only one thing to do
11111221222.title: Rev's little brother

choices: What left to do but, luagh your head off?
111112212221.content:
Rip digs in to your pits leaving you on your knees giggling like mad.


Ace, Lexi, Danger and Slam grab you and tie you to an X-frame. They also release Tech and Rev.

"PLEASE DON"T TICKLE ME!" You screram trying to use your tail to sheild your ticklish belly.

"Oh don't be such a wimp." Ace said as begins to caress your ribs

"We'll go easy on you." Tech says soothingly as he squeezes your love handles


You feel yourself giving in to despair as you sucumb to these tickly hands
111112212221.title: Beg for mercy

1111122122211.content:
It's SO embaressing!

Rev is furiously tickling your tummy and his brother Rip is chilling your toes with ice!

You squirm as Lexi Bunny squeezes your shoudlers and neck. Tech hands her a bottle and she puts a drop into your tufty ear.

"You'll thank me later." She whispers in your ear giving you a tickle under the chin

Slam grabs your bushy tail and rakes a brush through it, all this tickling is starting to hurt.

"Pl-hee-heese st-ho-hop..." You can barley whisper

But it continues relentlessly

Suddenly..
1111122122211.title: What left to do but, luagh your head off?

11111221222111.content:
When you wake up you are no longer tied to the X-frame but in a cozy bed.

At first you think that all that tickle stuff was just a nightmare and you are safe and sound in your house and home.

But all of a sudden you feel a few fingers doodling on your tummy!

Oh lord it wasen't a dream!

You sit up in fear and alarm! You look all around to see who is tickling you and you see Rev Runner lying beside you

"Hi there." He says dreamily

This is too weird for you, you jump out of the bed but when you see yourself in the mirror you scream (In a higher voice)

"GAH I"M A GIRL! I"M A GIRL SQUIRREL!"

Yup you're still a squirrel and what's more you're now female!

You have long rose-red hair that falls to the small of your back, you have long eyelashes and small but noticable breasts

Thankfully you are covered by a small snow-white nightgown

"Oh gee did I scare you? I'm sorry..."

Rev begins to approach you but you instead try to smack his face! But Rev is to fast and you end up smacking the wall (Thakfully not hard enough to hit your hand)

"Hey hey Calm down I'm on your side!" Rev holds up his hands defensivly

"Like Hell you're on my side!" You scream "You tickle me until I pass out than you turn me into a girl and sleep with me?! What kind of sick cartoon bird are you!?"

"First things first." Tech says as he walks in "You were a girl before you came to the mansion."The scientists here not only changed your species they changed your gender."

He lets out a snort "They must have affected your memory too if you can rember you were a human but not remember you were female."

"Really?" You say with tears in your eyes "I was really a girl?"

"Yes. I saw you when they first brought you here."

You are beginning to feel better with the thought that you really are a girl after all.

"What about that roadrunner sleeping with me?" You ask

"Oh please." You hear Rip's voice He enters wearing black pajamas with skulls them
"Rev didn't sleep with you. He just came in eary this morning to see how you were doing."

You notice bags under Rip's eyes and you wonder if he stayed up all night playing video games or something

You have only one question left
11111221222111.title: GENDER BENDER!

choices: Hopefully this won't end in tickling.
111112212221111.content:
"How did I get here?" You ask

"We honestly don't know." Tech replied "All over the world there have been reports of missing people. Some people have reterned but not as the same species they were."

Rev picks up "When we asked the people who did manage to retern all they knew was that they had been taken to a place called 'Bing's Tickle Mansion' but they had no idea how they got there or how they had transformed, so after a long. long search for this blasted tickle mansion we finaly found it we had to enlist as professtional ticklers but really we're secretly trying to bail all the prisonors and...."

"You might want to slow it down Big Bro." Rip says slowly as usaul "I think you lost her at Bing's tickle mansion."

He is right you could barely comprehend that long speech

You just stand for awhile trying to process all this new info, all the while you have been slowly becoming more comfortable in your female body

"Can you get me out of here?" You inquire

"We've been trying to find away to get anyone out for weeks!" Tech says exsasperaited

"But so far we can't do so without blowing are cover."

"But don't worry." Rev pipes up "We know somplace safe we can take you until the time is right."

With one big swoop, he wisks you into his arms and faster than you can say 'greased lightning' he zips off to a private relaxation room
111112212221111.title: All your questions, sort of answered!

choices: You prop your feet on Rev's lap
1111122122211111.content:
Rev zips into a lushious silk and velvet room. You see romantic red sofas, dreamy blue pillows and grapey purple curtains.

As you drink it all in with your eyes Rev locks the door so no one can walk in and sets you down on a sofa.

Although all this has left you feeling a little spooked you can't help but feel like a queen in this luxerious room.

Rev is sitting at the oppisite end of the sofa looking at you with a dreamy look in his eyes.

"I can't recall anyone ever looking at me the way you do." You say bashfully

Rev blushes "S-sorry bout that it's just.... you're so pretty."

You blush the deepest shade of red you've ever gone and try to hide your blushing face with your tail

"You want to tickle me don't you?" You say peeking over your tail

"Just a little bit." Rev jokes

Suddenly you want to be tickled! You can't explain why but you want to be tickled it feels like...

First love.
1111122122211111.title: I've got an itch to scratch I need assitance!

11111221222111112.content:
You roll up your nightgown to show your fluffy belly!

You lay yourself across his lap and instantly he gets the idea.

At first Rev simply rubs your tummy and you giggle enjoying the pressure.

Then he quickly digs in with wriggling fingers making you yip!

He tickles your ribs sending you into an ectasy of giggles

Suddenly! A knock at the door!

"You better hide!" Rev whispers "You nod and quickly duck behind the sofa

Rev opens the door and it turns out to be
11111221222111112.title: Cute belly

111112212221112.content:
"What should I do?" You ask

"If you want to get out of here." Tech says "You're going to have to locate the exit and that is no easy task as some of the people who work here can't find their way."

You sigh glumly as you think this will be an impossible task but Tech speaks up again

"Don't fret. You may not relyze this but your captors provided you the key to escape when they changed you into a squirrel."

"What really?" You say

"Think about it, " Says Rev "You can run, jump, climb and you've got highly advanced senses you'll be able to find your way out of here in a jiffy!"

You smile at first but than you think "How can I change back into a human?" you ask

All three of them look nervious at that question

"That's... a difficult question." Tech says "You have to go through the Sonic DNA Scramber to resume your human shape but that is kept hidden, locked-away, only known to the highest ranking empolyees"

You decide not to ask anymore about that.

"Where do I begin?" You ask

"First you head for the basement." Tech says "Than you head for the Grandfather clock that stands against the wall, open it up and it will reveal a secret staircase, that leads to an underground tunnel that opens up in the forest outside this mansion."

"We'll all help you." Says Rev "Tech will be in the controll and he'll shut off the power. I'll zip around the general area and make sure no goons stop you, Ace and Lexi will be in the forest to meet you when you reach the forest and Rip will acompany you throughout your journey."

"Why Rip?"

"Becuase he dosen't have super powers." Tech whispers "The mansion's super computer is locked on to our Super charged genetic codes so they will know if we're cuasing trouble"

"Well." Rip smiles at you "What are we waiting for?"

"By the way?" Rev asks "Do you remember your name?"
111112212221112.title: Mission Improbable

choices: Now you can begin your quest
1111122122211121.content:
You think deeply for a second. If you coulden't remember you were a girl how could you remember your own name?

You try to think hard and remember what happend before you first woke up here all that you can think of is swirling psycadelic lights, purples, greens and yellows mixed in a nausiating hurricane of colors.

You remember something else. A dark computer screen with green letters

You see the words in your mind's eye

Name: Lune
Subject: Human Female.
Transform to: Red Squirrel Anthro Male


"My name," You say "is Lune."
1111122122211121.title: You remember

11111221222111211.content:
After everyone changes from their nightclothes to their regular attire you are now ready to begin.

First Tech enters the controll room and shuts off the power Than Rev and Rip lead you to the staircase that leads to the basement Rip leads you down the unessisarily long starcase guided by a flashlight.

"We should find that clock here somewhere..." He searches for the timepiece "Here it is!"

You see a massive ornate clock! It is carved in intricate designs dipicting all sorts of furries, scalies and avians.

Rip opens up the clock revealing the secret starcase You both enter

You head down the dark winding tunnel in silence but than suddenly and without warning you hear the growl of a beast!

"Someone knows we're here!" Rip exclaims

You decide to...
11111221222111211.title: The Long Road Back

1111122122211122.content:
You try to remember your name but.... you can't.

You try to think back to before you woke up in the mansion but everything is a blur... so far all you remembered is that you were human and that was more like a gut instinct than a memory of your life.

"I can't remember anything." You say

"Oh geez." Tech says "They must've really wiped out your memory if you can't remember anything."

A tear slides down your muzzle as you feel ready to give in to despair.

"Well since we don't know your name yet." Tech says "Anything you want to be called?"

"I'm not sure." You murmur "What do you think would be a good name."

Rev looks at your hair "You're a redhead so...Rose?"

"I like that name." you say

"Than Rose it is"

"Maybe we should start on our way." Rip suggests

After everyone changes into their working clothes (You change into a t-shirt and jeans)

You and Rip begin to head for the basement. You desend into pure darkness down steep stairs.

Despite being a squirrel you feel terrified of the height, you cling to the rail going down one step at a time.

"You don't like heights?" Rip asks

"No." You squeak

When you reach the bottom of the stairs Rev lights a match and uses that to light a candle.

"We better keep moving." He murmurs

Along the way you see a door labeled 'DNA Database' and you wonder if the so-called 'sonic DNA scrambler' is behind it.

Rip pays no heed to the door and continues looking for the clock
1111122122211122.title: Quest for Memory

11111221222111221.content:
The temptation of hope is too great and you open the door.

You hear Rip calling your name but you pay no heed and enter.

The door closes behind you and you hear it lock behind you, now you can't get out!

You see a dingy grimey laboritory. You see tanks full of green fluid. Inside each of these tanks is a human being in various stages of transforming into a furry or scaly.

You look in one tank and you see a rabbit/human hybrid curled into fetal postion, next to that you see a calico cat hybrid who looks like nearing completion who has sunk to the bottom of the tank.

There are animals of all kinds from aardvarks to cougars to zebras though you question the making of ungulates becuase of their hoof feet.


You look at the main computer in the room you see that it is monertering the vital signs of all the creatures.

Suddenly you hear...footsteps.

You hide under a table, two men walk in.

"My invention is the superior one!" Says a deep resounding Upper class accented voice

"But mine promises faster results" Says a high pitched naisly voice that you don't like the sound of at all

"But the process cuases complete loss of memory!" Says the deep voice "The subject is a complete blank state!"

"And that's a bad thing?" The High Voice asks "It's better for buisness if they have no memory. We do things that are under no way legal or ethical, we kidnap sapient beings from all over the multiverse and experment them on ways that aren't legal on non-sapient beings! If a subject escapes, and at times they do, and reveals are practices and our loction to the rest of the world than every goverment in the multiverse will be on us like The King of Town on a baked ham!"

Their is no response from the other one.

"So it's better that my sonic DNA scrambler wipes the memory clean In some worlds anthros are considered 2nd class citizens or even property, some don't have any form of Non-anthro human at all so if a transformed human, with no memory escapes into these worlds and tries to tell the world they would most likly be considered crazy at best and a liar at worst!"

Just than a feathered hand grabs your mouth and pulls you into a cubbard

"For the love of Pete! What were you thinking?!"

"Danger Duck?" You ask

"Damn straight! Rip told us where you went and I had to quack in to find you before you did something stupid!"

"Do you hear something?" The deep voice said
11111221222111221.title: Straying from the Strait and Narrow Path

11111221222111222.content:
You carefully follow the Lunatic down a winding trail through piles of assorted junk. Stacks of furniture, crates, decorations, and odd widgets are heaped everywhere, and given the place's purpose, many of these are tickle-themed or involve restraints. Even with the ceiling so high over head, it still feels cramped as you wind your way through a narrow canyon between piles, with other possible paths opening up along every step of the way. You rapidly realize that it's a virtual maze down here; the floor isn't even always level, but dips and rises, forming alcoves where it meets the wall, and gnolls and hollows in the bulk of the ground.

         As you walk along, you see a blurred movement out of the corner of your eye, and turn to identify it. Nothing. You shrug to yourself, thinking you must be getting paranoid, and walk smack into a book shelf that look supsiciously like an upturned rack. You sit down hard, and blink, look around to see which way Rip went. You can't find him anywhere, not even the slightest glimmer from his candle, though you are rapidly starting to realize that there is some kind of faint ambient light, like thousands of miniature, faint light-bulbs in the ceiling, that keeps the place moderately lit. "Hello? Rip? ...Anybody?" You call, starting to get nervous.
11111221222111222.title: 'Basement' is a bit of a modest term for it.

choices: Wait to see what he comes up with.
111112212221112222.content:
You almost jump out of your fur as a pile of stocks and jars of sensitizing oils past their expiration date heaves over next to you, clattering against the floor. A tall, freakishly shaped figure lurches through the fresh gap, swinging in your direction. In silhouette, it looks almost like some kind of biologically deranged centaur; three graceful, arachnid legs lead up to an elegant disc-shaped pod. A chunky, mechanical torso rises from this in sharp contrast to the smooth lines, with three dangling arms or varying sizes and what seem to be patches of bristly hair. Swaying crazily, it advances on you, and suitably alarmed, you back up- right against a cul-de-sac of boxes.

          The thing takes a slow clattering step- and falls over, buzzing angrily in a robotic voice.
          "Darn it! I hate tripping with every third step! Bloody -Bzzzt!- inconvenient. Who designed me, anyhow? I should be able to function on three legs as well as four and-" A spotlight flicks on in the left side of its curiously misshapen head, pale light glinting off it's mechanical body as it turns towards you. "Why can't I be like you bipeds? If nothing else, at least you can hop if you lose a limb. But meee..." It pushes a theatrical, long-suffering sigh.

          "Y-you’re a ...Robot?"

          It rolls it's eyes, or so you assume. The actual action it carries out is to blink it's one remaining spot-light eye while leaning it's head inhumanly far back and bringing it snapping forward again. You realize that the droid it more beat up than having a tangled mass or wiring in place of a second spotlight- it is after all missing one of it's four legs, the source of it's complaints. Several other patches of exposed parts- which you had formerly taken for scraggly tufts of fur- denote areas short of smaller limbs or other artificial body parts. Many parts of it's chassis look like they've been removed, severely pummelled with a crowbar, and then screwed back on the wrong way multiple times. Some are scorched; others bear the long-dried stains of various unpleasant fluids. This robot had clearly been through allot.

          "No, mammal; it should think that it's fairly obvious that I'm the Tooth Fairy. Yes, I am a -Bzzzt!- a robot; Acme Security model Verminator 2000, #RF399, to be exact."

          "Uh, what happened to you?" You ask, starting to look for a way out of the cubby and away from the battered machine.

          One of RF's two remaining large upper arms- one three rotating tentacles set together near their base and the other a heavier, clunkier appendage- lever it back up to a standing position.
          "Oh, some of those crazy dingbats in Upper Management thought that it would be a good idea to call in a heavy-magic user and offer them a job. Or maybe just tickle them. What- Bzzt!- ever. They soon got out of their reception room without bothering to hear the sales pitch, and I was called in to stop them.           Little bugger froze me, supper-heated me, sonic-charged my plating to the crunching point, telekinetically ripped my arm off, and splashed me with bat guano before blowing a hole in time and/or space and heading to wherever home was. Then I had to sell another arm and one of my legs to keep from getting put in the smelter and melted down. I was instead demoted down to Supreme Lord Custodian of the Basement; I'm supposed to manage cleaning and security down here. By myself." He waves a faintly sparking arm at the surrounding heaps of trash. "It is a duty that I perhaps do not carry out with the proper enthusiasm. -But to think of it; Me, a Verminator 2000, locked in the sublevel for all eternity, arranging ragged couches. Oh well... Say, I've scanned you at least 7 times in every spectrum I can think of while we've been talking, and I can't find any -Bzzt!- authorization on you. Which would make you.... An intruder, that‘s it!
          Hold on a few jiffies while I check my manual for directions as to what that means. " He cups the bottom of his head in a metal pincer, staring into space with his half-gaze and looking as deep in thought as a robot can.

          Unsure of yourself, but feeling a sense of foreboding not dispelled by the obsolete 'bots quirky demeanour, you
111112212221112222.title: Something else.

choices: After some time, Rip finds you/you escape some other way on your own.
1111122122211122222.content:
Without a sound, you turn and begin scrambling up the precarious stack of storage, deft squirrel claws digging in and propelling yourself up rapidly, just as RF triumphantly exclaims behind you. "Aha! So that's it! 'Detain and tickle' !"

          As you leap up the side of one box, sending it clattering to the floor behind you, you glance over your shoulder. Rather than pursue, RF simply stands in place as well as he can on his uneven support. A hatch opens in his bulky chest, and some kind of thick green liquid shoots out, splattering over you and your avenue of escape.

          You try fruitlessly to yell, gunk sealing your mouth and one eye shut, as you fall backwards off of the teetering objects.
          "Wha' the- G’mmph!"
          Fortunately for you, the pile is more stable than it appears, and some heavy items in the box keep the container from falling over on top of you. Even better, the green goo covers nearly all of your back-side, including your heels. When you fall, they stay in one place, attached to the box. Your body swings down and thuds into it, cushioned by the plasma, rather than falling back to the floor. The momentum also flings your arms out 'behind' you -now above your head- before you can pull them in.
          Adhered to the side of the surface, you struggle, barely able to move a fraction of an inch without being rebuked by the rubbery compound, and seeing worryingly RF advance on you.

          From the corner of your remaining operational eye, you see the defunct security robot shoot out a thick tube; shaking, the cannula deposits a half dozen smaller robots; graceful disks about the size of your hand with multiple slender legs, onto the floor. Apparently done with talking, RF slowly turns about on his rickety legs and staggers doggedly away into the gloom, whirring and clicking.

          You own attention now focussed on the remaining robots left behind as they advance on you with single purpose, you redouble your efforts to escape. All you succeed in is shaking the part of your shirt not directly glued to the container into falling down over your face, and at accelerating the rush of blood to your head.

          A few seconds later, you're jerking on the spot again, this time at the feel of tiny pointed feet walking over your soft belly, with two sets of tickling pinpricks heading off down your legs and another two straying off near to you underarms. Oh god, this tickles so bad already, and they're just getting into position... Darn it, Rip , where are you? I gotta get out of this! You think, though all the noise you can make is:
          " Mmmph! Mm-mmph! Gmmhmm. Mph-mmm!"

          The material is actually quite porous; you can draw small breaths through it, and are in no immediate danger of suffocation. It's really the way that it prevents your jaws from opening and closing properly to make sound that inhibits you.
          In short order, having clambered their tickling way all over your helpless body -taking roundabout, meandering course -two spiderbots cling to the pads of your feet, legs intertwined around your ankles. One rests in each of you underarms, having extended their legs to meet in the middle and connecting them to the other across your chest to secure their position. The fifth has carefully asserted its position on your lower belly, centered carefully around you bellybutton. While you can't see it to confirm, you think that the final one may have split into two new bots, each fresh one having settled on one of your sides, right where your ribcage meets your belly.

          Knowing that their attack is imminent, you tense, waiting. Some tightening and last minute adjustments ensue, but otherwise they remain fixed in place. Cautiously, wondering if they had blown or fuse or boasted corrupted software that’s interrupted the proceedings, you start to relax.

          The tickling hits you like a sledgehammer. Hard.
          In sync, countless tiny bristles telescope from the undersides of each disc, each vibrating super-rapidly and moving in the fastest, tiniest strokes. The droids poised over your underarms pull together, forcing their individual masses of stiff brushes into the taunt hollows, probing deep into the nerve-ridden flesh.
          Similar tactics are used by the right member of the duo assaulting your footpaws, only all of it's brushes move as one, swiftly dragging up and down your feet, from ball to heel and back. Over and over. The one on your left, possibly programmed to take advantage of confusing sensory input resulting from multiple methods, instead raises itself up and slams itself back into your sole repeatedly, driving its brushes in in a way that is almost, but not quite, painful, covering a new, equally unprepared sector each time, whether heel, arch, ball, toes, or some combination thereof.
          6a and 6b don't bother to use their brushes to tickle; being small anyways, they simply secure their grip by twining them into your fur, using their actual primary locomotive legs to prod firmly into your ribs or the nerve clusters and down your curved sides.
          Meanwhile, a single flexible tendril drops into your navel, the end ballooning into dozens of miniscule brushes that can sweep out the inside of even that inaccessible but all-the-more-sensitive-for-it spot.

          While the nuances of their tactics may be lost on you, the effects certainly aren't. You shake wildly in your amorphous bondage, struggling to relieve the feelings flooding through you. You try twisting your arms and arching your back, but are in the wrong position to do either, even if doing so wouldn't remove the fur from the relieved area. The only part of you that can move freely is probably the tip of your long bushy tail, which is nearly a blur as your pent up energy struggles to find a release from your body. And all you can make is a muffled moaning noise; seemingly almost comically quiet in comparison to the volume of messages demanding succour. If Rip's lost you in the maze, he may have quite a hard time finding you again, you think distantly, eyes squeezed shut.
"MMMMMPH-MMMMMM! GMMGHHMMMM!"

1211112.content: You decide to go out the right door, and as soon as you step through, the door locks behind you."Dammit," you mutter to yourself as the lights flick off. Then out of the dark, you hear a muffling sound around the corner. Do you
1211112.title: You went Right

choices: Ask the fox for directions, but otherwise keep from interfering.
12111121.content:
Curious, and eager for an explanation as to your whereabouts at any rate, you padd down the narrow but plush hallway. Shaped almost like an enlarged alcove, it soon ends at an ornate door. Trying the knob, you find it unlocked, and open it just enough to peak in.

          The room beyond is thickly carpeted, except in the center, near a large cushioned dais, where it reverts to wooden planks. The ceiling, on the other hand, is some kind of earth-toned stone, vaulted and raised in a way that makes the chamber feel bigger than it really is. The walls are bare but for the odd picture frather up; at human-height they are suddenly covered in vases of exotic plants, hung with sets of padded leather straps, and inset with various sofas. The furninshings rest on a long lip that follows the cirular walls opposite the dais, given the surrounding floor a sunken appearence and making it look taller. All of which is cozily but dimly lit from lights concealed around the room, out of sight.

          The muffled noises come form the dais, where a male chipmunk, wearing only a set of pants, has been stretched out and gagged, a vixen reclining besides and tickling him relentlessly. Tied spread-eagled, every paw has a dark strap looped around it and leading to one of the many unobtrusive eyelets you now notice fixed to the sides of the dais.
          "Aw, is the wittle 'munk tickwish? You just can't defend yourself... " She purrs, rubbing his pectorals, a technique that you would normally assume to be ineffective, but that his writhing would suggest otherwise. "So, just what happens when I.... Do... This!" She suddenly changes from her previous slow method to a full assualt on his left underarm, nibbling, scrabbling, and scratching.

          His forcefully muffled protests rise as he struggles, simultaneously trying to wrench to the side and bring his arm down, with the two actions cancelling out before the restraints really need to take effect. Chuckling, she keeps the tickling while rolling over and sitting up to straddle him, switching one hand to his other armpit. His entire body arches in a futile attempt to buck her off, and she opportunistically dropps a paw to scuttle around on his suddenly tightened belly. With a massive exhalation, strength departs and he flops back on the pillows, grunting into his gag in in ticklish frustration.

          Feeling like you've lingered on the doorstep long enough, you decide to
12111121.title: Investigate the Sound.

You feel yourself geting sleepy and he rubs his thmbs over the balls of your feet.

Noticing this he says "He-he. Nighty-night, wolfie. Your gonna need all the rest you can get, now that you've become trapped in Bings Tickle Mansion. He he he."

You don't even notice this though, as your already fast asleep...
121122.title: Furrie z's.

choices: Max-You capture and interrogate a cute cleaning attendent.
Lisa-You duck into the room with the wooden door.
1211221.content: Rubbing the sleep from your eyes you stand, taking stock of your surroundings. Your standing on a thick plush rug that extends either way down the corridor, terminating at a large iron-bound wood door on one side and rounds a bend on the other. The hallway is fairly wide, and lined with alcoves full of statues. They seem to be odd decor, as most of them show furries, scalies, and full-blooded humans in a variety of positions being tickled. In between them are expensive works of art, lovely vases and great tapestrys. The floor is marble, though it is mostly coverd by the carpet. The wall and ceiling are of some kind of white stone that seems to glow with its own light. There are no windows. Suddenly, you hear someone coming from the side of the corridor that bends out of sight. Who are you, anyhow? Are you Lisa? She has dark grey fur, a white underbelly, long raven hair, and is wearing a black bikini that shows off her ticklish body. Or are you Max? He's a big, muscular type with soft brown eyes and is wearing jeans and a black T-shirt. Whoever you are, what do you do?
1211221.title: Setting the stage.

12112211.content:
As you hide behind a statue the tuneless humming comes closer. Rounding the corridor comes a cute bunny gal waering a blue short skirt and tube top, pushing a trolley like one used by janitors. As she pauses to dust off the statue opposite you, you leap out and pinn her arms to her sides with one arm, putting your other hand over her mouth to stop her screaming. You notice a small, unremarkable door in the wall nearby, and you drag your captive inside. You don't know what this tiny room is used for- storage, perhaps? Conveniently, theres an x-frame built into the far wall, which you swiftly strap your prisoner too. Pulling the trolley in behind you, you shut the door and face your detainee.

She has wavy, shoulder legnth blonde hair with two enormeous ears sticking straight up through it, and soft, creamy white fur. She also has huge breasts and large feet. Pulling a feather duster from the trolley, you say "All right, what's going on here. Where am I? How did I get here? Speak up!" She stares at you fearfully with a pair of big blue eyes, and says"I-I don't know. I woke up in a cell in the building a good distace away; this place is massive. I heard them call it 'Bing's Tickle Mansion' or something. When I woke up, some of my friends were with me, but they started tickle torturing them. They decided to make me a cleaning attendant. I don't know what's going on." You notice she's also wearing, in addition to her narrow blue tube-top and short skirt, a thick leather collar with a brass ring in the front of it.
"Oh? And who's this 'they' you kep referencing?" You ask.
"The scalies! There were dozens and dozens of them where I woke up, in the dungeons. Most of them looked like gaurds. Since then, though, I haven't seen a single one, or another furrie for that matter."
"Hmm, well, where is the entrance to the dungeons from here? What is he general layout of this place?"
In response to your question, she hangs her head and says"I don't know."
"Oh? Well perhaps I can refresh your memory." You let down the duster and start tickling her sides, making her scrunch her face up and shake with laughter. You kneel and start blowing raspberreis on her navel, positively making her shriek. Even though you continue to apply your memory refreshing techniques for quite some time, you don't have any luck, and finally admit defeat. Letting her down, you ask her her name "Oh", she looks at you shyly, and you have a hunch that she secretly enjoyed your interrogation. "It's Christy."
12112211.title: A new friend.

12112212.content:
Not really wanting to be seen until you've found out where you are, you run down the corridor and open the heavy wooden door, slaming it behind you. Turning, you're shocked by the sight that meets your eyes.

"Dungeon" might be a good way to describe the room: The walls and vaulted ceiling are made of heavy dark stone blocks, and it's illuminated by torches in wall brackets. They cast an unsteady light on the rooms inhabitants. Several scalie guards stand watch over a group furrie girls held in a variety of ways by "x"-frames,"I"-frames, "Y"-frames, stretch racks, stocks, vertical pillories, or simply chained to the wall, ceiling, and floor.
And they're being tickled.
To your right, a red-headed tigress is bound in an upright "Y" possition, howling with laughter as two translucent, magical hands dig their fingers into her sides. To your left, an enormos polar bear lady chained with her arms and legs wide strains to swat away a comparitively small female scalie who's toying with what must have been her victems supersensetive navel. Her bindings allow her to yank her muscled arms somewhat, and allow her hands to get frustatingly close to her tormentor befor yanking them back again. "Coochie-coochie-coo, my little bear." Chirps the scalie, swirling a claw in her captives bellybutton. Just seeing these and a dozen other scenes arond the chamber make your ticklish spots tingle, which is virtually your entire body. In horror, you turn and try to open the door and return to the hallway, but there's no door-knob on this side! Suddenly, you feel rough hands grab you from behind, and your dragged by one of the larger guards to a vacant rack."Look at this, girls: We got another prisoner to play with!" She yells. As she does so, she throws you down, and puts your feet and hands in stocks, then pulls a lever which stretches you out uncomfortably. Another guard forces a shiny red ball-gag into your mouth. "Right, now where shall we tickle you?"
12112212.title: The T.D.

choices: They let you rest and recover before switching taregts/something similiar.
You plunge fully into ticklish sub-space, reliving encounters of the past.
121122122.content:
"Hmph-mph-mph! Grmph!" You grunt nervously through the gag, struggling to pull your limbs back to your body. The soft leather lining the stocks lets your hands slip around somewhat, and keeps the strain off of your wrists and ankles, but refuses to surrender its steadfast grip. Intense awareness of the accessibility of your ticklish body concerns you, rivaled only by acknowledgement of your inability to defend yourself or escape the predicament.

         Your captors- some kind of monitor and a smaller humanoid python, both in rather scant leather uniforms- drift down towards your feet-paws. One smirks and snickers something to the other as they size up your bound paws, before running just a single, delicate claw lightly down your curvaceous sole. You tense up electrically, useless tugs on your bindings abruptly shifting from wearily hopeful to outright frantic.
         "Grrrumph! Nou-unggf!" You plead, barely capable of believing how unhinged the very threat of tickling has you. Of course, the multitude of screaming, laughing voices forming the room's ambience don't assist your piece of mind in keeping it's feet with any great success.

         Ms. Monitor guffaws, evidently pleased at your reaction. She slowly let's her other hand descend to your large, soft foot, three fingers wiggling adroitly. You yelp into the gag as your toes scrunch up, foot reflexively pulling backward only to be rudely rebuked by the stocks, the digits on the other limb flexing wide in comparison. The trio trace their torturous train down the length of your sole; over the large, bare black primary foot pad covering your deep arches, curving out of their way to form faint spirals as they pass through the short fur on the firmer ball and heel, moving with a slow, rhythmic scratching motion all the while.
It's maddening as hell, and your helpless body shows it to the fullest.

          "Wow, Ceshellia, this wolf you captured must be ticklish as laughter itself on her feet! Veeery nice catch." Complements the python, casually seizing hold of your right big toe to worm an exploratory finger into the nerve lined crevice beneath.
          "Thank-you, Set-yin. Let's make the most of it, eh?" Ignoring your horrified, stifled pleas, the two sadistic scalies kneel down and begin to tickle your large feet in earnest. All hands come to stations, running up and down as they poke and prod, skitter and scatter without warning. Claws trace all over the trapped appendages, circling the pads, dipping down into the toes, performing exquisite little dances as fine and as practiced as any ballet as their wielders drive you mad with grim focus.
          Your muscles spasm uncontrollably, well beyond your ability to consciously direct them in an escape attempt or any other objective for that matter, meeting the limits imposed upon them by your bindings and fighting in a vain attempt to exceed them. Your feet twist and twitch on their own accord, struggling fruitlessly to evade the pointed fingers that pursue them relentlessly.

         "Gmmph! Mpph-m-m-m-mph! No-umph!" You splutter into the gag. Cesh eventually finds and starts to work a tiny niche where your arch commences its' slope up towards your toes, and you arch your body completely off the ground, pushing with only your wrists and ankles, a shocked lupine howl not being fully penned back by the muffle as all of your toes uncurl at once.
         As you collapse back to the mattress after several seconds in the frozen crescent pose, veritably sobbing with frustration, Set turns slightly, twisting her arm up and around to put a finger between each of your toes from behind. She trades a wicked eye with her monitor confederate, before starting to scratch, nails beginning their strafe at the sweet spot, moving up and digging in hard on the ball, while their placement in the midst of your toes prostrates you entire foot, resisting its' every attempt at a return to its previous relative freedom. Cesh, meanwhile, leans her snout in close, nibbling and licking at the fleshy part of your soles in considerable enjoyment. She grabs hold of your toes with both hands, holding your feet steady as she cleans every inch of it with liberal usage of her tongue. To compensate, her fleshy tail curls around her sculpted body, the tip stabbing lightly into the center of your major pad.
         And still the tickling continues unabated, the ladies heavily engrossed in their task, while you're unable to so much as beg hopelessly to relieve your mood and distract either them or yourself.

         As time wears on and on, your struggles start to slowly decrease in tempo, strength showing it's gradual, inevitable drain. Tears come to your eyes, and your feet begin to feel slightly sore as well as ticklish under the seemingly unending ministrations of your captors. Your jaws, held open for an extended period of time, slowly start to ache, ton say nothing of your exhausted throat. This was worse than any of the various tickling incidents you had undergone in the past, more intense, focussed, merciless. Your friends or siblings would never have gone this far... Or so it seems in vague retrospect.

A dark shadow appears at the doorway, you can't make out what or who it is, the hovering lamp only shines above you. But you try to focus on the figure, but all you can get is an outline. It's pretty large with a square head and a square body, with big bulgy circlular eyes and ears that ironically look like headphones. But that doesn't matter right now.

"What have we here?" the figure asks in a very deep, robotic voice.

But it is also a facility testing new methods to extract information we need. But we don't stop there, we also put our fellons in here and put them through vigorous tasks that even they would regret ever committing crime again."
"So...this is a jail? Then why am I here?!" you yell out. Your anger begins to increase as you start to grow impatient and just wanting to get out of here and go home.

Oh good lord...your stomach felt like jell-o when he said what your here for. The first thing that popped in your mind was these torture equipment that would actually hurt you and cause you pain.

You then take a deep breath and blow it out in relief, but don't get too comfortable.
"I'm just going to tickle you."

"Let's get started shall we?" he says and then grins.

Lock Up slaps his forehead

They decide to lock you up with Jonathan Crane AKA The Scarecrow!

Before you enter the robot removes the mud encrusted rags that were all that remains of your clothes (You don't know how your clothes got covered in mud but than again you may not want to know)

At first you are frightend, than you feel annoyed, you crouch down and shiver for this room is so cold and complain about the absudity of the situation.

"Just my luck. I wake up in a freaky mansion, in the form of a Dragon, with no memory how I got there, and now I'm told I'm going to be a guinea pig for tickle torture, and on top of that I have to be roomates with one of the meanest pyscos this side of Vlad the Impaler!"

You're bigger and stronger, you can fly, you are not sure if you can breathe fire (Or anything for that matter) But you're willing to try if this Nutjob tries anything funny

And you hear anouther sound... weeping. The Scarecrow, the master of fear is...weeping.

It is very soft and muffled for he is weeping into his arms. In a curious mix of tenderness and curiousity you come closer and closer until you can smell the salt of his tears and he can feel your hot breath above him.

That's when he relizes he is no longer alone and gets up.

'"Who's there?" He barks

The expresstion on his face is
12121112.title: The Master of Fear

The Robot leaves you stare at that pile of fish you're expected to eat. Finally your hunger gets the better of you and you grab a fish with your mouth and swallow it whole.

You try not to let the flavor linger on your tougue but insted keep swallowing fish whole until you've finished it.

All the while your mind wanders to the subject of eggs, golden fluffy whipped up eggs, no you wouden't ask for pheasant when an omlette would suffice.

You satisfy your hunger but that disgusting meal only dampened your spirits further, You think what horrible tortures they have prepared for you today. Hopefully that cyborg hasen't been fixed yet, but the very thought of being tickled again makes you want to cry.

So you just slink under Scarecrow's bed bury your face in your clawed hands and cry your eyes out.

Suddenly you hear a sound. Jonathan Crane enters the cell. He looks more dead than alive. He colapses onto his bed with a moan.

"I was just tickled after breakfast in case you're wondering" He says

"By the tickle cyborg?" You ask

"By the what? No it was done by hand." That seems to be all he can manage to say before he faints dead away

Suddenly an angry looking man came in. "Where's that dragon?" He wonders aloud, you bury even deeper under the bed. Feeling your heart pount like crazy.
The man looks your away, suddenly you feel a tickle in your nose, quickly you hold your breath, trying to keep from sneezing, until...
"Ah, ah, ah, ACHOO!" You bellow out. A cloud of dust surrounded you.
"Aha!" Suddenly you feel a tug on the collar around your neck. You cough. Accidenly spitting a moutful of smoke. "Hey! Let me go!"
The man didn't answer, but continued to pull you out of the cell and into a strange, dark room. A team surrounded you, each of them was carrying a handful of feathers and some other tool you had never seen.
"Dragon Taunters," The man said, "Made for tickling dragons like you."
You shiver, but at least it wasn't the Tickle Cyborg.
The team lifted you up onto an iron table, it was clammy. Thick leather belts strapped around your back, tail, and neck. One doctor jammed something round into your mouth. You gag but swallow it. "That way you can't breath fire." The doctor said.
One a large man doctor then came up, only he didn't have feathers or anything, he was just flexing his fingers.
The doctor then began to reach for...
12121112211211.title: Time for your next test

choices: All of the doctors tickle your belly

The doctor then dug all five fingers into your belly, immediately you burst out laughing! The doctor wiggled his fingers slighty. It tickled so hard!
"HEE HEE HEE! STAHAHAHAHAHAAP IT!" You exclaim. The other doctors nearby smirk.
Then the other doctor began using his other hand to stroke a feather down your belly. You SQUEAL!
"HAHAHAHAHAAA! NONONONONONO!" You bellow out.
Suddenly...

121212.content:
The figure pulls out a bag and goes infront of your feet.
"What are you doing now to me", you ask afraid.

The figure smiles as he took a rope to tie your toes on your ankle, so your soles are streched.

"Oh I see your feet are very dirty....should i clean them for you", he sneers, when he take out two soft brushes.

"NO! PLEASE ANYTHING BUT NOT THAT!", you beg, "please i am begging you, my feet are really ticklish, you would kill me if you wash them with the brushes!"

But he ignores you and dips the brushes in a bucket of soap.

"no no no plehehehehehahahahahahaseeeeeeeeeeee", but he already have start to clean your feet.
121212.title: He pulls out a bag...

1222.content:
A long series of windows open, showing you to be in a high, luxurious room. Even the restraint you're sitting on looks like antique wood and leather. Your legs are out in front of you with your gigantic paws secured to a central pole by the ankles. The wrist restraints turn out to be two separate pieces (which explains why you couldn't get them open) with chords reaching into the ceiling.

A long stretch of windows stands in front of you, facing the sea.

..and SOMETHING is digging frantically into your armpits! No! They're squirming- they're fingers!

Your hands are burning, pulling frantically at those cords.

They...won't...leave...you...alone!!!

They slow down and scrape softly along your ribs, caressing. But it still tickles.

You recognize the voice instantly:
1222.title: Gargomon

choices: Impmon continues to tickle you with his feet
Impmon still goes for your feet

"Whoa there big guy, I know what'll calm ya down." He crawls down to your belly causing his foot claws to tickle your ribs and belly, your snickering was so heavy that you can barely ask Impmon what he's doing. "Hmm, that was interesting," says Impmon, "I was going to get your feet, but...
12221.title: Impmon

choices: She jumps on your lap and digs into your belly!
She lightly tickles your giant paws
12222.content:
"I'm paying $7,000 an hour to have you here... It's going to be worth it" she croons, almost flirtatiously.

...an hour? How many is she planning?

No time to think! You have to avoid those nails brushing ever so lightly on your belly-fur. You try to lift yourself off the chair, only managing to avoid one nail at a time. They scrape so gently over your belly, leaving you to buck and contort and bend and fail and giggle and succumb to those gently little tickles.
12222.title: Renamon

choices: She moves on to your feet
122221.content:
She throws one leg over your lap and successfully straddles your helpless belly. You harshly pull at both wrist restrains, but you can not get your arms low enough to even begin to protect you. She clutches your love handles and begins to squeeze viciously, which tickles like hell. They work up to your armpits, dragging and playing along the way. Your breath catches.

You feel sensitive.

It's like weightlessness, the tension which overcomes you as her fingers quietly explore your ticklish spots. She's laughing almost as hard as you are. She digs ferociously into your nerve-laden pectorals and brushes your neck with reckless abandon. Finally, she brushes her nails softly from your neck to your waist, and all over. You recoil and try to keep just a single bit of you out of her grasp, failing miserably.

"You are just too kyoot!" she chirps, hunting down your sensitive spots.
122221.title: She jumps on your lap and digs into your belly!

choices: She takes advantage of the spot
1222211.content:
"Let's take a look at those bunny feet of yours," she nearly whispers. She sits down at your feet and examines them for a moment. Her cruel claws reach out, hovering around your poor paws.

"I'm not touching you!" she sings. You squirm uncomfortably, breathless. Her claws start to contact; one here and one there. Quick, gentle pokes cause your feet to recoil every which way, so sensitive to the coming torture. Short, wining chuckles escape you.

She pushes one foot up by the toes and smugly rakes her nails across your instep. You shake them off, but she pushes your foot up again and repeats. She scrapes across a particularly sensitive spot right above your heel, which makes you grit your teeth.
1222211.title: She moves on to your feet

12222111.content:
"You might want to get a grip for this one," she teases. She grabs each heel between her thumb and second finger, leaving her pointer fingers free. "Alright, here we go!" she announces.

Those two fingers frantically dig into those sweet spots at the bases of your arches. It's absolute murder. You buck and toss like a bronco; you kick your feet as hard as you can. Still, she holds on tight and lets her little fingers work their magic. Those two little fingers are making you shriek and scream like a maniac. She playfully rakes across your soles at full speed, and there's nothing you can do about it.

And this goes on for a while.

A very long while, it seems. Any second you should break, and it's like you just keep breaking and can't do anything about it.
12222111.title: The Sweet Spot

122221112.content:
And you wake up, giggling lightly.

A finger is swirling gently around your belly. You roll away automatically and, upon finding that you could actually roll away, you instantly wake up.

You're lying on a luxurious bed, totally unrestrained. Renamon's arm creeps over your side, making you panic. But it just comes to a rest, draped over your side. You turn to look.

Her head is etched from the dust-laden morning light. Save the light sound of wind chimes and the lapping tide in the distance, it is curiously silent.

"Hiya" she says, dreamily.
122221112.title: The Black out

1222211121.content:
"Why did you do that?" you ask, shortly.

"Hello to you too" she replies.

"No, I mean it. What was that about?"

She hushes you cutely. "It's alright, Guilmon told me all about it." You look back at her crossly. "He told me that your fantasy was to get tickled to tears by me."

"What?!" You burst. "Where is he?"

"What, did he make that all up?"

"Yes!!" You shout, vaulting from the bed.

"He's around here somewhere, or at least he was earlier."

"Come on." You demand. "I could use an extra set of hands."
1222211121.title: What was that all about?

choices: You make her get off your back
12222111212.content:
You storm furiously from what appears to be the penthouse. You march down the modern-looking hall. After about fifteen paces, Renamon launches weightlessly onto your back, playfully wrapping herself around your neck.

"That was great, by the way."

"Hmmm" you growl.

You descend the stairs into a bright, sleek lobby. It's swarming with all sorts of creatures; some you recognize and others you don't.

"Morning Miss Renamon," smacks a golden-eyed water monster with a wet-sounding voice.

"Good morning, Rodney." She sings. "My ride finally decided to join us."

"I see that, mam. Very good!" A quick, low growl of yours shuts him up.

"Elevator's that way," she gestures.
12222111212.title: No time to waste!

122221112121.content:
Both of you have to duck to get through the door of the glass elevator. It slides down the shaft quietly and dutifully, and Renamon manually stops it a few floors down.

You head down an airy corridor and Renamon asks another little blue thing where Guilmon is. It directs you to a room and Renamon steps forward.

"Better wait here, steed. If he sees you, he'll probably try to escape. Let me work my magic first."

She opens the door, heads inside, and immediately bursts into a fit of laughter.

"Gargomon, come in!"

You do, and there is Guilmon, restrained. His feet are straight out in some metal ring-stocks, and his hand-paws are straight up in the air. You laugh with Renamon.
122221112121.title: To Guilmon

choices: Digivolve back down to Terriermon first
1222211121212.content:
"So I guess you're going to punish me, right?" Guilmon says with a crazy smile.

"What, do you actually LIKE being tickled?" interjects Renamon.

"Mayyybe..." says Guilmon, his smile getting funnier. His face gets even funnier when Renamon bends forwards, hands on her knees, and runs her tail up his side. She is very pleased by the reaction.

"Don't just stand there, steed! Give me a hand!"
1222211121212.title: Guilmon blushes

choices: Maybe he could use a taste of his own medicine.
Maybe you could use a taste of those soles.
12222111212122.content:
Alright, Guilmon must be crazy to actually set himself up like this, but it's your job to make him regret it. You drop back down to size and get to work.

Renamon's already busy with his pectorals; each squeeze sends him flying to another side of the table. You pull a tall stool right up to his soles, which are remarkably still for how much he's bucking.

Just look at them. They're so smooth and broad but with such high arches and such bright skin. One little poke makes the right one recoil, wrinkling up in apprehension.
12222111212122.title: Digivolve back down to Terriermon first

1223.content:
"...He..Hello?" you venture.

Something is happening near the floor, or the walls are pulling up. You hear hushed voices.

Gigantic spotlights hit you from nowhere, blinding you. The noise deafens you. You start to adjust, and you see a crowd all around you. They're cheering.

You're on stage.

You're on the stage of what appears to be, of all things, a tacky Japanese game show. You have a fine megavision directly in front of you, hanging above the audience of hundreds. Graphics are flying all over, as are portraits of what you assume to be previous victims in mid-laugh. You can see yourself, dead center, looking utterly panicked. Your arms are being held up in the air by the wrists, you have padded restraints around your waist, and you are stuck in contoured ankle restraints which are holding your soles straight forward. You squirm feebly.

Someone is silhouetted by smoke from behind a garish sliding door. They are holding a microphone. They step out.
1223.title: Sumi Masen!

choices: She displays the rest of you
12233.content:
She immediately starts chattering to the audience in Japanese, playing the crowd. They're eating it up, of course. After a loud flourish, the lights are killed. A camera drops down from the ceiling, hovering close to you.

On the megavision, your feet begin to come into frame from the left. A dramatic Japanese voice is talking, obviously about you, as the camera pans along your body. You look panicked, so you take a deep breath to try and settle yourself. You time it wrong, immediately gasp for air, and end up looking even more panicked. You're scared.

A few lights focus directly on you, and Renamon kneels down next to your feet. The camera pulls up close, and you can see Renamon and your quivering soles on the megavision. She's telling the audience something while presenting your feet with playful gestures. Your feet pull up tight when one of her fingers starts stretching for your instep. You quickly steel yourself, but her assertive little nail makes you yip and jump anyways. She lightly pinches the balls of your feet, the heels, and your pads. When you hear the audience ooh and ahh over the 100-foot-tall images of Renamon pinching your soft soles, you feet utterly embarrassed.

The camera pulls in close on the flesh right below your toes. Renamon finds a feather and gently brushes it over that skin, making your toes squirm uncomfortably. The audience laughs as you try to shake the feeling off.
12233.title: It's Renamon

"So~, is the little Treecko awake yet~?"

"break's up, your tormentor says cheerily and he presses a different button. when the butto is pressed, two metal claws come down from the cieling holding what appears to be a belt with feathers and tiny vines inside of it. you shudder with anxiety as the strange belt is latched and fastened onto you. HEAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHAAA!" They wiggle around, giving you such a sensation as if you have never been tickled before in your life. Kaclang. Your right leg is unlocked. As noctowl pushes the button to release the restraint on your stomach to free you once and for all, you begin to get angry. You want... Revenge. he releases your final restraint...
